pageDescription: Various best facilities and services to support your trading activities safely and comfortably

services.title: Futures Broker Dealer (WPB)
services.description: The company is supported by Professional Futures Broker Dealers certified by Bappebti.

services.title: Online Registration Facility
services.description: We provide facilities for Prospective Customers who want to join PT. Kontakperkasa Futures by registering online at www.kp-futures.com.

services.title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) Security System
services.description: Implementation of One Time Password (OTP) when logging into the online trading transaction system.

services.title: Online Trading & Demo Account
services.description: A special portal for online transactions via the internet. Equipped with real-time price spreads, chart views, and market information. Also includes a Demo Account facility for transaction simulations.

services.title: Daily Transaction Reports
services.description: Daily transaction reports are sent to customer emails and can also be monitored directly through the online trading system.

services.title: Fund Withdrawal
services.description: Withdrawal forms can be processed online. Funds can be processed within one business day (T+1) after all requirements are met.

services.title: Segregated Account
services.description: All customer funds are placed in a Segregated Account approved by Bappebti and separated from company assets.

services.title: Transaction Flexibility
services.description: Two-way transactions allow investors to profit whether the market rises or falls, with high product liquidity.

services.title: Dispute Resolution
services.description: Customer complaint handling refers to Bappebti Regulation Number 4 of 2020 concerning Guidelines for Customer Dispute Resolution in the Commodity Futures Trading Sector.

services.title: Sitna Program
services.description: A transaction transparency program that allows customers to monitor transactions on the Jakarta Futures Exchange (JFX) and Indonesia Clearing House.
